evidence_in_dialogue: [[Catherine]] those are shoe prints on his face
[[Sara]] devon malton , age five , last known residence was a foster home run by a lorna tenney
[[Catherine]] those are shoe prints on his face , which suggests that he was attacked while he was down

[[Sara]] seven alleles in common with the dead boy
[[Warrick]] your boot prints were found on the victim 's head
